reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering for their body type and appreciate its nice color, with one noting it feels and looks more expensive than its price. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its comfort and quality, being described as a great little black dress. However, the fit, material quality, and length receive mixed reviews - while some say it fits amazing and has a good length, others find it too big, made of cheap fabric, and slightly longer than expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Choice!
items.body: Loved the look. Dress was so light and very comfortable. I wore it in the blistering heat in July. The dress is simple style that can easily be dressed up. It was true to size. The quality of the dress was good. Read more
items.author: Student

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this purchase
items.body: Cute dress. I bought a medium and I think a small would have been a little better. Not egregious so will keep the medium as I only need it for 1 event: my son’s Clemson ring ceremony (Go Tigers). I’m 5.5 and it is a fine length (a little above the knees). I have an athletic build with a menopause belly and had plenty of room in the stomach and thighs. (I don’t know if it is, but it reminds me of an A line cut.) My only question would be for well endowed woman. I’m not and it fit fine there. I think it might be a little tight if you have a large chest. The material wasn’t clingy or sheet. For the price, I think it’s a great find. Read more
items.author: Kelly Barnes

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Peek a boo
items.body: It is cute and the mesh panel gives it a dressier feel. I took it on a cruise to wear for dinners. It looks good with black stockings or not. It hits me right above the knee so not mini on me. You can easily wear it with flats or heels. Very comfortable and travels well, a great value. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for one wear only!
items.body: Cute look Snags easily Does not way and wear well The sheer cutouts fell apart after one hand wash I ordered it in pink as well and it’s holding up better but just don’t wear it often. It’s great for a one time event look Read more
items.author: Jenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any occasion
items.author: Tamara Willcutt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Comfy pullover dress or tunic top -- easy care
items.body: AMENDED REVIEW (one star): DO NOT PURCHASE! You can see my original review below. I purchased the first dress in this style (the one shown in the photo) LESS THAN FIVE MONTHS AGO. I liked it so much (at first -- see initial review), that I've purchased a few other colors / patterns. Now, I wish that I hadn't. The net trim - which is similar or identical to tulle - is tearing away from the dress. Since I've now looked closely at how it is constructed / sewn, I can see why. I can't tell if the problem is due to the seam being too narrow or if the netting, itself, is of low quality -- or both. I have almost a lifetime of sewing experience and am very accomplished -- so I should have inspected the first dress when I first received it and anticipated this problem. Fortunately, since I can sew, I can replace the netting with another type of trim (probably another type of sheer fabric). Which is a hassle, but quite frankly not as big a hassle as returning the three or four of these dresses that I have purchased. Which, as I noted in my original review, I otherwise like. If I were not able to sew and were not confident that I can fix this problem as it arises on each garment, I would be returning them all to Amazon. (Haha -- I promise that it only coincidence that my middle finger is the one sticking through the tear. I didn't even realize that until I noticed it in the photo here.) ORIGINAL REVIEW (five stars): I love this dress. I use it as a tunic top over leggings or pants. It pulls over the head, so no buttons, snaps, or the like to mess with. It is easy care -- comes out of a (low) drier almost wrinkle-free. Read more
items.author: kayemmdee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: I love this dress! It is very complimentary, simple yet elegant. Add some jewelry and you are ready. Great fit, I ordered Large, in black. Fits perfectly everywhere. I do think it runs a bit bigger than a regular Large. I usually wear an L or XL, just depends who makes it, so I juggle with both sizes. Very happy with it. Thank you. Read more
items.author: Joyce Dacy

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Printed Blue, Dark Sapphire, Dasiy Print Black, Lucky Evergreen, Salmon, Floral Printed Yellow, Floral Pirnt Brilliant White, Lavendula, Hot Pink, Savvy Red, Black, Orange, Cranberry, True Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
